channel.title: David Jonsson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in David Jonsson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Long Walk’ Review: Francis Lawrence’s Stephen King Adaptation Is Bleak, Bruising and Emotionally Affecting
item.description: The ‘Hunger Games’ helmer adapts one of King’s grimmest novels, with Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson, Judy Greer and Mark Hamill starring.

item.title: ‘The Long Walk’ Review: Francis Lawrence’s Stephen King Adaptation Is Bleak, Bruising and Emotionally Affecting
item.description: The ‘Hunger Games’ helmer adapts one of King’s grimmest novels, with Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson, Judy Greer and Mark Hamill starring.

item.title: David Jonsson on Mentoring Young Filmmakers With BAFTA: “We Can’t Expect Them to Make It to the Table — Odds Are There Aren’t Enough Seats”
item.description: The ‘Alien: Romulus’ star has teamed up with Daisy Edgar-Jones, EE and BAFTA for a new initiative called Set the Stage, where 16 teens have been selected to form a crew and produce a short film.

item.title: David Jonsson on Mentoring Young Filmmakers With BAFTA: “We Can’t Expect Them to Make It to the Table — Odds Are There Aren’t Enough Seats”
